name: Fext
description: The Fext is a Medium undead creature with magical attacks, characterized by its unsettling presence and infusion of powerful magic into its weaponry.
memorable: It can terrify enemies within a 10-foot radius with psychic damage, disrupting battlefield dynamics.
goals: To inflict significant damage and instill fear among its enemies through powerful magical attacks.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other undead creatures or magical beings.
environment: Typically found in dark, eerie places or areas corrupted by dark magic.
strengths: Exceptionally high Charisma enhances its defense, magical damage output, and ability to resist spells.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on spells, which may open it up to specific forms of melee combat or strategic defenses.
attacks: Makes two attacks with either the Eldritch Blade, dealing slashing and force damage, or the Eldritch Fury, a ranged attack that deals force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Patron’s Might can inflict significant psychic damage and frighten nearby enemies, causing chaos.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 20 feet, allowing it to pierce illusions and perceive unseen creatures.
skills: Noteworthy in Perception, indicating good awareness in combat situations.
additional_information: Immune to poison and several debilitating conditions.
Resistance to nonmagical physical damage enhances its durability.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Utilizes magical weapon attacks that deal significant additional force damage.
Gains advantage on saving throws against spells.
test_queries: creature with truesight and magical weapons
